headline: Rockwell Automation Declares Quarterly Dividend at $1.31 Per Share on Common Stock
summary: MILWAUKEE, June 11, 2025--The Board of Directors of Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), following its regular review, today declared a quarterly dividend of $1.31 per share on its outstanding common stock, payable Sept. 10, 2025, to shareowners of record at the close of business on Aug. 18, 2025.

headline: ROK Q1 Earnings Call: Tariffs, Cost Discipline, and Automation Demand Shape Outlook
summary: Industrials automation company Rockwell (NYSE:ROK) reported Q1 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, but sales fell by 5.9% year on year to $2 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.45 per share was 15.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
